content: Just between you and me, I never know {A心虚目移}when Captain Mo is asleep—I've never seen him close his eyes... Never seen him open them either, for that matter...
info: 莫白聚餐-格连闲聊_主流程文本II

content: Do you think Sani's theory could be right? <style=SizeSmall>When he's completely still, he's actually sneaking in a little snooze?</style> Anyway, once you're done, don't forget to go see him!
info: 莫白聚餐-格连闲聊_主流程文本II
